qas.question: What did Feynman produce that help in understanding calculations between particles in space and time?
What is the name of the antimatter counterpart of electrons?
Where did Feynman paint his diagrams?
What did Feynman digrams allow him and others to do?

answers.text: approach time reversibility and other fundamental processes

qas.question: What did Feynman steal that help in understanding calculations between particles in space and time?
What is the name of the antiparticle part of electrons?
Where did Feynman code his diagrams?

plausible_answers.text: approach time reversibility and other fundamental processes

qas.question: What did Feynman diagrams allow nobody to do?
What diagrams did Feynman put on the exterior of his truck?

context: He also developed <a0_0><b4_0>Feynman diagrams<b4_0/><a0_0/>, a bookkeeping device that helps in conceptualizing and calculating interactions between particles in spacetime, including the interactions between electrons and their antimatter counterparts, <a1_0><b5_0>positrons<b5_0/><a1_0/>. This device allowed him, and later others, to <a3_0><b7_0>approach time reversibility and other fundamental processes<b7_0/><a3_0/>. Feynman's mental picture for these diagrams started with the hard sphere approximation, and the interactions could be thought of as collisions at first. It was not until decades later that physicists thought of analyzing the nodes of the Feynman diagrams more closely. Feynman painted <b8_0>Feynman diagrams<b8_0/> on the exterior of <a2_0><b6_0>his van<b6_0/><a2_0/>.
